title: PSA: Pings
body:
This is a public service announcement.

Ping once, not 10 times.
If you ping 10 times, all that happens is that your team mutes your pings.

If you ping once, then every now and then you can double ping for extra attention, and people might care.
If you ping 10 times on any little thing, no one gives a fuck about your pings.

This is how it goes, so learn a lesson.

replies.body:
Honestly, I think people in my ELO don't notice if you ping only once. That's from experience.
2-3 does the trick.
Right? Why didn't I or anyone else see you pinging baron? Probably because you were destroying my eardrums over every little thing so I muted you 20 minutes ago.
Personally I think like 4 pings minimum but anything over and I feel distracted
